name: Sum Of Parts
description:
Work In Progress

Prototype

Spilt Your Body Parts At Will.

In this demo you can control your arms, legs, or head

Controls:

1- Detaches Left arm 

controlled with W, A, and D 2- Detaches Right Arm 

controlled with W, A, and D

3- Detaches Left Leg 

controlled with W, A, and D

4- Detaches Right Leg 

controlled with W, A, and D

5- Detaches Head 

controlled with A, and D (can jump  with W key when under chest)

Shift 1- Detaches Left arm 

controlled with S, Z, and C

Shift 2- Detaches Right Arm 

controlled with S, Z, and C

Shift 3- Detaches Left Leg 

controlled with S, Z, and C

Shift 4- Detaches Right Leg 

controlled with S, Z, and C

Shift 5- Detaches Head 

controlled with Z, and C can jump with S key when under chest

To Reattach go to the spot you detached from
